title: Mad Cartoon Network Season 1-3 Complete + S04E01-S04E07
description:
A Web rip of the Cartoon Network TV show called MAD.

If you loved Mad Tv you might like this one.

"MAD is an animated sketch comedy on Cartoon Network, based on MAD Magazine. MAD magazine (and the show) parody many popular shows or products, usually putting two popular things together in one sketch.
Some examples from the show are "Avaturd" (Avatar), "Yu-Gi-Bear!" (Yu-Gi-Oh! and Yogi Bear), "HOPS" (COPS and the movie Hop), and "Moneyball Z" (Moneyball and Dragon Ball Z)." - MadWiki


"Mad is an American animated sketch comedy series created by Kevin Shinick and produced by Warner Bros. Animation. Based upon the magazine of the same name, each episode is a collection of short animated parodies of television shows, movies, games, celebrities, and other media using various types of animation (CGI, claymation, stopmotion, etc.) instead of the usual animation style that Warner Bros. Animation is known for. The series premiered on the evening of September 6, 2010 on Cartoon Network. It has been described as a "kid-friendly version of Robot Chicken" - Wikipedia
